items.sentence: Tom drove through a red light, causing an accident.
Tom reached for the light switch and turned it off.
Tom was convicted of murder and sentenced to death.
Mary was wearing a bikini that last time I saw her.
Unfortunately, all good things must come to an end.
Tom wanted directions to a good Chinese restaurant.
Tom wanted me to come over for breakfast, so I did.
Tom wanted to live in Boston with his grandparents.
Tom slapped his forehead with the palm of his hand.
Tom suddenly got a cramp in the middle of the lake.
I\'m kind of hoping Tom doesn\'t come to the party.
Would it be OK if I didn\'t invite Tom to my party?
Do you really think that kind of thing can be done?
Do you really want a job in the same office as Tom?
Tom said he wanted to learn how to swear in French.
Tom thought Mary would want him to do that for her.
I can play the guitar, but I can\'t play very well.
I can read French, but I can\'t speak it very well.
I can tell from your face that it\'s not good news.
I can understand why Tom wouldn\'t want to do that.
